title: Child's Hat
description: black, pink, blue, red; long; covers neck and ears with long flaps and ties; three dimensional face; pink ears, white eyes, blue nose, red mouth, pink tongue, yellow whiskers on black background; orange florals on ear backs (stiff); white teeth and fangs; black tail with fringe; ears fringed in purple; some outlining in metallic paper; blue lining and ties; blue/green streamers down back; orange sewn-on trim overall
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
